abstract: Seven Arab citizens of Israel are arrested for supporting Islamic State, extremist group that has been outlawed in Israel.
lead_paragraph: The men, residents of Galilee and the Negev desert, have been charged with membership and activity in the Islamic State.
snippet: The men, residents of Galilee and the Negev desert, have been charged with membership and activity in the Islamic State.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Eight Israeli Arab Men Are Charged With Aiding Islamic State
headline.print_headline: Eight Israeli Arab Men Are Charged With Aiding Islamic State
